data.title: Who Are We?
data.meta_description: Meet the leaders and staff of Trinity Pines in Lake Mills, WI
data.meta_site_name: Trinity Pines Independent Senior Living Community Lake Mills, WI
data.text:
​Our team is small but mighty!

​

Carl: Carl Reinemann is the Director of Facilities here at the Pines. Carl is responsible for the overall operation of Trinity Pines, resident relations, overseeing all operations, managing budgets, directing routine maintenance, responding to emergencies, managing risk, managing staff and contractors, overseeing building security.

Sharon: Sharon is a dedicated staff member who has been with Trinity Pines for over 19 years. Her daily doses of humor put a smile on everyone's face!

Loretta: Having lived here herself for over 22 years, Loretta is the go-to for common questions. She writes the weekly newsletter and works in the office a couple of hours a day, including being the main morning light checker.

Ned: ​Our Maintenance technician, Ned is local to Lake Mills, and knows his way around tools and fixing just about everything!

Occasionally we have the need to add to our team of part-time smiling faces. Click on the "Apply Now!" image to connect to a PDF version of the employment application that can be emailed back or dropped off on-site. ​
